IBody Interface Reference
[BODY+ Module]

import "bodyplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for IBody:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

BODY+ high level interface to the character body.

This interface represents an array-based dictionary structure for uniform and efficient acquisition of body parts along with information on them. Whatever the input bones hierarchy, once properly attached to the IBody-based object all the body objects are available through uniform FWULONG constants (see below).

Identifying the Body Parts

Many functions in this interface use nIndex param to identify a body part. This value is created by summing a number of constants, majority of them defined as enums:
  • BODY_XXXX Part Id - obligatory, see BODY_PART_ID
  • BODY_RIGHT or BODY_LEFT to choose between left and right side - where applicable, see BODY_PART_LR
  • BODY_1 .. BODY_5 - applicable for fingers and toes only, see BODY_PART_FINGERTOE
  • any number from 0..255 to choose the link index - where applicable.

Examples:

  • BODY_HEAD = head
  • BODY_SPINE + 2 = 3rd link of the spine
  • BODY_HAND + BODY_RIGHT = right hand
  • BODY_ARM + BODY_LEFT + 1 = left forehand
  • BODY_FINGER + BODY_LEFT + BODY_1 = first segment of the left thumb
  • BODY_FINGER + BODY_LEFT + BODY_RING + 2 = last segment of the left ring finger

See also:
Implementation in FreeWillPlus::Body with support for 3DMax CharacterStudio characters

Public Member Functions

Loading body parts from an external model
HRESULT LoadBody (IKineNode *pBody, FWULONG nSchema)
 Loads entire body using a given schema (see BODY_SCHEME for list of available schemas).

HRESULT LoadBodyPart (IKineNode *pNode, FWSTRING label, FWULONG nIndex)
 Loads the object and attaches it to the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts).

HRESULT RemoveAll ()
 Remove all the contents.

Getting body parts
HRESULT GetBodyPart (FWULONG nIndex, REFIID iid,[out, retval, iid_is(iid)] IFWUnknown **p)
 Returns the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts).

IFWUnknown * BodyPart (FWULONG nIndex, REFIID iid)
 Returns the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts).

IKineChild * BodyChild (FWULONG nIndex)
 Helper function: returns IKineChild for the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts).

IKineNode * BodyNode (FWULONG nIndex)
 Helper function: returns IKineNode for the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts).

IBounding * BodyBounding (FWULONG nIndex)
 Helper function: returns bounding volume for the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts).

Queries
HRESULT GetInfo (FWULONG nQuery, FWULONG nIndex,[out, retval] FWULONG *)
 Returns information for the body part identified by nIndex (see Identifying the Body Parts); see BODY_INFO for available types of information.

HRESULT GetFInfo (FWULONG nQuery, FWULONG nIndex,[out, retval] FWFLOAT *)
 Floating point version of IBody::GetInfo.

HRESULT GetXYZ (FWULONG nIndex,[out, retval] FWVECTOR *pv)
 Returns global position (x, y, z) of the body part or (0, 0, 0) with FW_E_BADINDEX error code if bad part index.

Helpers
HRESULT CreateCompatibleTransform ([out, retval] ITransform **)
 Creates a transform compatible with PELVIS node; returns FW_E_NOTREADY if no PELVIS set.
